atk_abil: Normal Attack : Deals damage to enemy units and has a chance to freeze them by throwing frozen magical daggers.
Skill Attack : Deals damage to enemy units and has a chance to freeze them with a number of frozen daggers.

Special Ability 1 : Makes its body invisible (cloaking), then advances stealthily and destroyed the enemy units' base. ( But, if hit once by an enemy unit which can detect cloaking, the cloaking is lifted. )
Special Ability 2 : Increases the basic speed of the game by 2%. ( If double speed is applied, the game speed increases by 2.04x cumulatively )
Special Ability 3 : Increases the movement and attack speed of all units by 2%.
Special Ability 4: First attack is dodged 100% by taking a step back. (Cloak will be removed)

Spirit Awakening : Maximum level-up increases by 5 for all units. ( [Spirit Awakening] is cumulative, but the maximum level-up for units cannot increase more than +100. Can also be activated in the Time Shop. )

buffs.description: Maximum level-up increases for all units even if Wyvern Rider is in the Time Shop. (5-star 5 levels, 6-star 10 levels, Max 100 levels).
